alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and east central Putnam Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crescent Beach to 7 miles west of Marineland to San Mateo. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Palatka, Pomona Park, East Palatka, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Orange Mills, Butler Beach, San Mateo and Satsuma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
